name: Art Party
description:
Ah, the thrill of sport! 🤼🤾🏾🤽

Art Party is a 4+ player game combining Telephone and Pictionary. Players pass cards in a circle alternately drawing and guessing. Once the cards have gone around, everyone reviews them and fun ensues. 🤪 If a guess matches the starting word, every player who previously touched the card gets a point! 💯🥇

Automatically discovers players on the local network for quick and easy setup! 🎿🎿🤼‍♂️ Peer to peer networking 😲

Source on Github under the MIT License. 🤓
